title: Dragon Warrior: The Chosen One
description: A warrior unparalleled in battle, fights back the hoards of an invading mob of evil creatures. Apoc is a prophesied hero of unmatched power, or so he thinks. An evil is growing in the Dark Clan, and an unsung villain will be born out of the heat of the struggle. Will Apoc be able to save this villain from himself? Will he be able to hold back the invading hoard?
author: Wesley Nixon
